title: Create your own kit
body:
Take any passive and 4 abilities from any existing League of Legends Champion and create your own kit.

For me:
Passive: Lucian's Lightslinger
Q: Vayne's Tumble
W: Ekko's Phase Dive
E: Quinn's Vault
R: Olaf's Ragnarock

It creates an ultra mobile, anti-melee champ who uses their abilities for constant AA resets (so that OP Trinity Force).

Share your creations in the comments.

This makes an SUPER high damaging champion that spins to win the entire game and with the recommended build you automatically win

Teemo's passive (the one that makes you invisible)
Q: Leona's Shield of Daybreak
W: Sona's Aria of Perseverance
E: Katarina's Shunpo (quicker cooldown, lower damage and damage ratio, trading the defensive boost for movement speed)
R: Soraka's Wish

This creates an ultra-mobile assassin-support with a stun, heals, a blink and the ability to go invisible.

Ekko has a stun slow blink heal and speed up. this is exactly like ekko.
I don't think Ekko can heal teammates
